news.title: Reform plans to scrap indefinite leave to remain for migrants
news.summary: The party says scrapping the scheme and restricting migrant access to benefits will save hundreds of billions of pounds.

news.title: EU cyber agency says airport software held to ransom by criminals
news.summary: Brussels Airport asks airlines to cancel nearly half of their outgoing flights on Monday.

news.title: Lib Dems want 'cigarette-style' health warnings on teens' social media
news.summary: The party says mandatory warnings are required to protect children from "addictive" app algorithms.

news.title: Trump hails Charlie Kirk as martyr as thousands fill memorial service
news.summary: The US president broke with the forgiveness message of Kirk's widow, Erika, to say he hated his opponents.

news.title: Christian Horner formally leaves Red Bull with Â£52m pay-off
news.summary: Christian Horner formally leaves Red Bull after agreeing a severance deal following his sacking as team principal in July.

news.title: The songs I've chosen to help me prepare for dying
news.summary: Music can evoke powerful memories and offers a sense of normality for people dealing with illness or death.

news.title: Trump will reportedly link autism to pain reliever Tylenol - but many experts are sceptical
news.summary: Some studies have suggested an association between the two, but experts say there is no causal relationship.

news.title: 'My girl can't walk or talk': Searching for answers in Wales' rare disease cluster
news.summary: Families affected by a rare inherited disease say they have had to "scramble" for information.

news.title: Outdoor brand Arc'teryx apologises for 'dragon' fireworks in Himalayas
news.summary: Officials are investigating the firm after the display drew backlash for its potential environmental impact.

news.title: What does recognising a Palestinian state mean?
news.summary: The UK, Australia and Canada have recognised a Palestinian state, while France and other countries are set to do so in the coming days.
